column9: My concern is that the pin code necessary to access account information, pay bills, etc is stored as plain text in Alexa's voice history list, and can be read by anyone who looks.

column6: A slight bug... when I request to make a payment of some amount of dollars "and one cent," it doesn't map the "and one cent" to an amount, so it asks me to confirm payment of just the whole dollar amount. If I say "and one cents," it maps that correctly to the additional $.01.

column5: I would like to see this fixed to allow a payment to be made when there is a balance on the card, even if there is no minimum amount due.
